title: Pixel 2 phone stuck on G loading screen
content:
After running out of power during a fb live video- upon startup while charging it is now stuck indefinitely in the G loading animation.

Troubleshooting I've done:
-Restarting numerous times gives same endless boot (holding down power)
-have let the loading go overnight to no avail
-have fully charged/discharged battery 
-able to reach bootloader, and used it to power off, and also access recovery mode (restarted that way too) 

As a photographer, I would like to avoid losing all my images/reformatting if possible
